sentences.en: a campaign of industrial espionage against his main rival
sentences.cn: 针对他主要竞争对手展开的商业间谍活动

sentences.en: Apparent, compare weak China as technical capability, just be the biggest victim of network espionage battle.
sentences.cn: 显然, 作为技术能力比较弱的中国, 才是网络谍战的最大受害者.

sentences.en: Applications of microwave technology in espionage were available for over 25 years.
sentences.cn: 微波技术在间谍身上的应用可长达25年.

sentences.en: As the war went on, counter - espionage officials developed ways of spotting suspicious letters.
sentences.cn: 随着战事推进, 英国 反 间谍工作人员总结出了许多破解可疑信件的方式.

sentences.en: Azam Azam, an Israeli citizen, was imprisoned in Egypt in 1996, accused of espionage.
sentences.cn: 1996年, 以色列公民阿扎姆·阿扎姆在埃及受到间谍罪指控, 被判下狱.

sentences.en: Crucially, it also led to some risky espionage.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是, 一些更危险的情节由此上演.

sentences.en: Foreign espionage would do its utmost to prize out these secrets.
sentences.cn: 外国谍报机构竭尽全力获取这些机密.

sentences.en: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
On Tuesday, he was charged with espionage and conspiracy 16 to commit espionage.
sentences.cn: 接着在周二, 汉森被指控犯有间谍罪和间谍同谋罪.

sentences.en: The new information left McCarthy open to an espionage charge.
sentences.cn: 新的材料可能使麦卡锡面临间谍罪的指控.

sentences.en: Theoretically the difference between espionage and legal information gathering is clear.
sentences.cn: 理论上间谍之间的差异和法律信息收集是很清楚的.

sentences.en: This Agreement is subject to the Economic and Industrial Espionage Law of the International Economic Community.
sentences.cn: 此协议遵从国际经济共同体关于经济和工业间谍法的规定.

sentences.en: This happens! Industrial espionage -- - Phil , Phil , Phil !
sentences.cn: 这种事有可能发生,工业间谍! -菲立浦!

sentences.en: This is war. A Cold War. fought with information and espionage.
sentences.cn: 这是战争, 冷战, 拼的是信息和谍报.

sentences.en: Why don't you stick to your perfume ads and leave the espionage to me?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不做你的香水广告把间谍留给我?

phrases.tran_cn: 工业间谍；工业谍报活动

trans.tran_en: the activity of secretly finding out secret information and giving it to a country’s enemies or a company’s competitors
